com.javagameengine.events

Class MouseMoveEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javagameengine.events.Event
      • com.javagameengine.events.InputEvent
        • com.javagameengine.events.MouseEvent
          • com.javagameengine.events.MouseMoveEvent

  • public class MouseMoveEvent
extends MouseEvent
    Event describing a mouse moving across the screen. Gives the mouse's X and Y positions after movement in addition to the change in X and Y since the last MouseMoveEvent.
    Author:
    ClairaLyrae
